reviews.review: I keep coming back to this game despite it being a buggy mess and somewhat rage-inducing at times. There will always be those matches that are just silly or unexpected that make the game so fun. Then there's the close ones where you just barely make it out alive or maybe you're killer and it's rough at first but then you make an awesome comeback! I also really enjoy the progression system and cosmetics.
Next time let us change the resolution.
muito bom o jogo recomendo e muito!!!

Hi,

I am a complete noob at this game, having purchased it only 3 days ago.  I played it for 20 hours so far and I need to take a break from it.  Here are the reasons why I am not recommending this game in the current state it is in:

1.  God awful, broken match making.  I played as rank 18 killer and survivor and was frequently facing off against players with purple perks and several ranks and levels above me.  Nevermind the fact that playing as killer I had to wait up to 10 minutes sometimes to get a match, while as a survivor I would get a match within a couple of minutes.

2.  Toxic as hell players.  Even when trying to play nice as a killer (not tunneling on purpose, not camping at all)  still got called trash killer and people suggesting that I should never play this game and immediately uninstall it.

3.  Some of the maps in this game are absolutely trash for both survivor and killer gameplay.  I am referring to the Asylum and the Yamaoka Estate maps specifically.  Honestly, they are too small, cramped with foliage that gets in the way and obstacles that you can get stuck on while chasing/being chased.

I have revised the review somewhat as I've played the game a bit more, since the last time I reviewed it.  While the points above are still true i have come to realise that you as player need to prioritise the parts of the game you enjoy over the parts that are quite broken.  Once you do that, the game becomes quite fun to play.
really good game especially with friends

[h1] WE DID A PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR [/h1]

Modern take on hide and seek  with trademarked and original monsters from your favourite movies and nightmares. Gameplay takes time to get used to and games polish levels lack at times, but a lot of fun can be had if it fits your cup of tea.

La verdad es que compre este juego por que estaba en oferta, tan solo me costo 75 pesos y les puedo decir que es uno de los mejores que he jugado, me engancho desde el primer juego. ahora no puedo parar de jugarlo. Para los que estamos hartos ya de los tipicos FPS o Juegos de estrategia, este juego es altamente recomendable. Me da un poco de lastima haberlo descubierto tan tarde. Creo que 2018 fue el mejor aÃ±o para este video juego. pero sin duda a fecha de hoy, aÃ±o 2020 sigue funcionando perfecto y tiene buena comunidad. Me encantoooo!

This game was fun for the first few months after it was released out of beta, now it has become a cash pump with dlcs every months. 

The devs constantly rework killers or release new killers that are overpowered to force people to buy DLCs. They have no clue of what is going on in their game, they don't even play it and if they do so its with a controller..

Whatever rank you are in this game, only despair, frustration and anger will arise from playing it. Stay away if you have any love for yourself
